pullrequest.title: Fix Issue 2239: All links teleport to origin if model has a revolute2 joint.

content.raw:
looks like some compiler warnings from these floating point comparisons:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none&build=964)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/964/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/964/warningsResult/

in our fork, we added a `_dequal` function for floating point comparisons with a tolerance; see the `makeV1andV2` function in this same file
content.html:
looks like some compiler warnings from these floating point comparisons:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/964/warningsResult/

in our fork, we added a _dequal function for floating point comparisons with a tolerance; see the makeV1andV2 function in this same file
